backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data models, access control, and CRUD operations for notices, events, gallery items, memberships, payments, contacts, and user profiles.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that seeds gallery items if empty and preserves existing state while updating nextGalleryItemId.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking an admin-access feature to its source file, components, and test reference.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Router setup defining all app routes and wrapping them with the SiteLayout root component.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Implements a contact form with validation, submission via useSubmitContact, and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/components/forms/Membership: Provides a membership registration form with validation, membership type selection, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Renders a lightbox for gallery images with navigation controls and keyboard support.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Displays payment options for maintenance fees and welfare contributions with placeholder buttons.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component displaying association info, quick links, contact details, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, desktop and mobile navigation, and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating notices, events, gallery items, contact info, and user data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables for light and dark themes, and custom utility classes for NCRL colors.
frontend/src/lib/events.ts: Maps event type enums to readable labels for UI display.
frontend/src/lib/gallery.ts: Provides helpers to normalize, validate, and sort gallery items for UI use.
frontend/src/lib/notices.ts: Maps notice category enums to human‑readable labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the association’s About page with mission, vision, and committee info.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements admin dashboard with authentication, profile setup, and management of notices, events, and gallery items.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information and a contact form, with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx: Lists downloadable documents such as layout plans and association bylaws.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Shows upcoming and past events using fetched data and event type labels.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders the gallery with loading, error, empty, and lightbox states using processed gallery items. Allows selecting images to view in a lightbox.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero section, quick links, and previews of notices, events, contact info, and gallery items. Loads multiple data sources and displays a small gallery preview.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPaymentsPag: Displays membership registration and payment sections using a form and payments component. Provides a simple layout for joining and contributing.
frontend/src/pages/NoticesPage.tsx: Shows notices filtered by category with tabs and loading, empty, and populated states. Fetches notices dynamically based on the selected category.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including support for hash-based routing. Provides persistence helpers for parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, pending feature requests, and known issues related to gallery seeding, persistence, and admin access. Tracks schema and project metadata.
